name: Specific learning difficulty
description: Such as dyslexia, dyspraxia or AD(H)D

name: Social/communication impairment
description: Such as Asperger's syndrome/other autistic spectrum disorder

name: Long standing illness or health condition
description: Such as cancer, HIV, diabetes, chronic heart disease, or epilepsy

name: Mental health condition
description: Such as depression, schizophrenia or anxiety disorder

description: A disability, impairment or medical condition that is not listed above

name: Information refused
